name: Midnight Dash!
description:
It's midnight and you're a crab on the beach. But oh no! The flash light mob is out to get you! Run, run, run! Avoid the flash light beams. 

Your goal is to have the least amount of flash light hits in one minute. Go!

*Have sound on to hear the ocean waves crashing in the  background as you scurry along.

*Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD for movement

Credits: Sound & Art by Debbie Berlin
